title: Without engaging in presentism, and strictly in terms of astuteness relative to their contemporaries, who are the best human beings ever to walk the earth? List as many people as you like. - Quora

response.answer_text: Presentism is the application of current ideals and moral standards to interpret historical figures and their actions. For example, consider Mr. John Teacher who caned pupils in his 1889 class. ... Teacher isn't to be blamed.
